TableSpec.Name: USR_D2_CAMPAIGN_BUSINESSPROCESS
TableSpec.Description: Parameter table for the D2 Campaign business process.
TableSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

TextField.Name: NAME
TextField.Description: The name of the parameter set

Trigger.Name: TR_USR_D2_CAMPAIGN_BUSINESSPROCESS_DELETE_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE
Trigger.Description: Used to delete the common business process records associated with this record.
Trigger.CreateTriggerSQL:
create trigger TR_USR_D2_CAMPAIGN_BUSINESSPROCESS_DELETE_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE on dbo.USR_D2_CAMPAIGN_BUSINESSPROCESS after delete not for replication as begin
delete from dbo.BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE where BUSINESSPROCESSPARAMETERSETID in (select ID from deleted) and BUSINESSPROCESSCATALOGID = 'd180e31a-b7e2-4e0d-a4fd-76195ea8bd42'; -- guid is the ID from business process spec - see D2Campaign.BusinessProcess.xml end
